top_comments.comment:
I didn't expect it'd play Genshin but wow... it does.
I feel a bit bothered by the blank space on the bottom half. They could probably put another screen on there and we'd have full Nintendo DS emulation with much bigger upper screen.

comments_since_last_sample.body: lineage 18.1 will make this boss
it would be nice if you use the T770 instead of the weak T618
That device will be better if it can install batocera or any retro os but it is not, but that's OK is still good
I am not going to be picking up one of these. I am waiting on a handheld that can play any gamecube game that I throw at it.
$170 is too much.  Retroid does the same for less than half, or a LG G8X with 855 and 6gb can play 3DS for $120
Why didn't they spend an extra $5 on decent parts and charge an extra $5 for something that plays well?
For $179 you can get a switch lite from a pawn shop..
I would like to see psx games on duckstation with highest resolution on this device.
Is the Tiger T618 better than the Helio G85?
That looks bloody awful.  It looks like 90's cheap Chinese knockoff of a 90's SNES, especially with the gaudy "PowKiddy" driver logo plate.
Wow, the one thing you could use this for (fighting games and platformers) is ruined by oversight of a good dpad.
These are all trash. You’re best off with a decent android phone and a bt controller.
Stadia??
Loving the new 3ds.
...no
